name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Jose Enrique NIEVES, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Jose Enrique NIEVES, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
The Judgment of the Court of Common Pleas of Lancaster County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Thomas G. Klingensmith, Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.
Edward F. Browne, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 509
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Jose Enrique NIEVES, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 13, 1980.
Decided Feb. 5, 1981.
Thomas G. Klingensmith, Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.
Edward F. Browne, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
